item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Thalia - Thalia (2013) (4 Exclusive Songs in Portuguese for Brazil) [FLAC 16Bit/44.1kHz] TIDAL
item.description:
Thalia is a mexican popstar mostly known for her role on telenovelas such as “Maria do Bairro” in Brazil, she released a compilation album with some of her successful songs in the rest of Latin America and recorded 4 songs in brazilian portuguese

these songs are region blocked and can only be streamed in Brazil, so here they are:

MANÍAS
BEIJAME
ESTOU APAIXONADO (feat DANIEL)
EQUIVOCADA

Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.


Thalia also recorded 3 songs in portuguese for the brazilian release of her album (1998) Amor a la Mexicana, which I don’t have! (Noites Sem Lua/Menino Lindo/De Onde Sou) & also the song from Fox’s Anastacia “Viajem Ao Pasado”​
item.author: TheMagicKingdom
